DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study adolescents 13 18 year age morbid obesity determine whether surgical treatment give health benefit standard conservative treatment , laparoscopic gastric bypass method high safety low complication rate .

The procedure take place Hospital Vestfold The participant include 2 year follow-up visit multidisciplinary team every 3rd month Morbid Obesity Center . Total follow-up time ten year .
